name: EcoCommute Smart Route Planner and Carbon Emission Predictor

parameters.subject: Your Eco-Friendly Commute Route Suggestions
parameters.text:
Hello,

Based on your origin and destination, here are the top 3 most eco-friendly commuting routes we found for you:

{{$json.suggestedRoutes.map((route, i) => `${i + 1}. Mode: ${route.mode.toUpperCase()}
   Distance: ${route.distance.toFixed(2)} km
   Duration: ${route.duration} minutes
   Estimated Carbon Emission: ${route.carbonEmissionKg.toFixed(3)} kg CO2
`).join('\n')}}

Thank you for choosing sustainable commuting!

Best regards,
EcoCommute Smart Route Planner

EcoCommute Smart Route Suggestions:
{{$json.suggestedRoutes.map((route, i) => `*${i + 1}.* Mode: *${route.mode.toUpperCase()}*
   Distance: ${route.distance.toFixed(2)} km
   Duration: ${route.duration} minutes
   Carbon Emission: ${route.carbonEmissionKg.toFixed(3)} kg CO2
`).join('\n')}}
